description: Splitify is a way to save your time when sharing the restaurant bill with someone
name: splitify

scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.test: PHANTOMJS_BIN=/usr/local/bin/phantomjs JASMINE_BROWSER=PhantomJS JASMINE_SERVER_UNIT=1 JASMINE_SERVER_INTEGRATION=0 JASMINE_CLIENT_UNIT=0 JASMINE_CLIENT_INTEGRATION=0 VELOCITY_DEBUG=1 velocity test-app --once --ci --settings settings.json
scripts.test:ci: JASMINE_BROWSER=Firefox JASMINE_SERVER_UNIT=1 JASMINE_SERVER_INTEGRATION=0 JASMINE_CLIENT_UNIT=0 JASMINE_CLIENT_INTEGRATION=0 VELOCITY_DEBUG=0 velocity test-app --once --ci --settings settings.json
